job.title: Site Reliability Engineer, Big Data Platform
job.description: The RolebrbrTesla is on mission is to accelerate the worlds transition to sustainable energy We are looking for a Site Reliability Engineer to join our data platform team We are a small expert crossfunctional team made of data engineers and SREs We are building a fairly large platform that other teams ranging from autopilot to service technicians leverage to collect and access data We are already processing trillions of events per day but with more and more cars on the road more and more Superchargers Powerwalls solar installations new factories in China and Europe and of course new products coming to markets we need to think about scaling up our hybrid infrastructure to the next levelbrbrWhat we are buildingbrulliWe are building a hybrid platform with onprem datacenters and public clouds in multiple regionsliliOur stack is fairly modern Our services run in containers and we are taking advantage of everything we can in the cloudliliThe infrastructure is completely described and managed using infrastructureascode IAC and configuration management toolsliliWe build and deploy over a hundred microservices using BazelliliAt the datalayer the stack is built on top of technologies including Spark Kafka and relatedliliWe develop tools in Python and Go to support predominately JavaScalabased applicationsliliFor monitoring we use Prometheus Grafana Splunk and CloudwatchliulResponsibilitiesbrbrYoull work on high impact projects that improve data availability scalability and reliability of our data infrastructurebrulliThese days we are trying to
